title: Bug 115960- Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When inputting the new Date() as content for three items and saving and previewing them, the dynamic text item displays a different format compared to the data and text item in the table.
EB: The expected result is that all three items should display the same format for the datetime values.
SR: To reproduce the issue, insert a text, data, and dynamic text item in the table and input 'new Date()' as the content for each item. Save and preview the items.
